segments.text: Could you help me to register for a class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know what class you want to take ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are there any Psychology classes available ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I believe there are still two Psychology classes open .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: On what days are the classes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is one class on Tuesday and Thursday from 2 to 4 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me about the other class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's from 10-12 on Monday and Wednesday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're positive that these are the only classes left ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: These two are the only ones .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The class on Monday and Wednesday will be fine .
segments.speaker: S1
